nodes.description:
ocultamos productos que no tengan disponibilidad
,regexp_replace('diameter=16,','16',Atributo06)

configuration.sql:
select CodInterno, EAN, Matricula, DescripcionAlias,Descripcion02,Categoria
	,Atributo03,Atributo04,Atributo05
	,linkImgL,linkImgM,linkImgS
	,ServiciosObligatorios,ServiciosOpcionales
	,ActivoExterno,Precio
	,titulo_neumatico_matricula,codigo_neumatico_matricula
	,case when disponibilidad='__EMPTY__VALUE__' or Estado ='Desactivado' then 0 
		else 1 end as product_online
 ,originalfile
 ,isMatricula
 ,runflat_text
 ,Atributo09,Atributo06,Atributo08,Atributo07
 ,Atributo16,Atributo10,GrupoProducto,disponibilidad,orden_disponibilidad
 ,disponibilidad_matricula,orden_disponibilidad_matricula,availability_date,orden_alfabetico
 ,concat (
 'cai=103293,'
 ,'color=red,'
 ,'label_icon_1=C,'
 ,'label_icon_2=A,'
 ,'label_icon_3=1,'
 ,'label_icon_4=68,'
 ,'on_hover=png,'
 ,'tyre_group=Marca líder,'
 ,'tyre_store=Motortown,'
 ) as  additional_attributes 
from AddDisponibilidadMatricula

Select 
concat('"', coalesce(CodInterno,''), '"') as  sku ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  store_view_code,
concat('"', coalesce('Neumaticos',''), '"') as  attribute_set_code ,
concat('"', coalesce('simple',''), '"') as  product_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('Default Category/Neumáticos',''), '"') as  categories ,
concat('"', coalesce('base',''), '"') as  product_websites ,
concat('"', coalesce(titulo_neumatico_matricula,''), '"') as  name ,
concat('"', coalesce(titulo_neumatico_matricula,''), '"') as  description ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  short_description ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  weight ,
concat('"', coalesce(product_online,''), '"') as  product_online ,
concat('"', coalesce('Taxable Goods',''), '"') as  tax_class_name ,
concat('"', coalesce('Catálogo, Búsqueda',''), '"') as  visibility ,
concat('"', coalesce(Precio,''), '"') as  price,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  special_price ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  special_price_from_date ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  special_price_to_date ,
concat('"', coalesce(CodInterno,''), '"') as  url_key ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  meta_title ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  meta_keywords ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  meta_description ,
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgL,''), '"') as  base_image ,  /*substr(linkImgL,-17,17)*/
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  base_image_label , 
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgL,''), '"') as  small_image , 
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  small_image_label , 
concat('"', coalesce(linkImgL,''), '"') as  thumbnail_image , 
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  thumbnail_image_label , 
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  swatch_image , 
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  swatch_image_label , 
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  created_at ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  updated_at ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  new_from_date ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  new_to_date ,
concat('"', coalesce('Block after Info Column',''), '"') as  display_product_options_in ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  map_price ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  msrp_price ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  map_enabled ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  gift_message_available ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  custom_design ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  custom_design_from ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  custom_design_to ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  custom_layout_update ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  page_layout ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  product_options_container ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  msrp_display_actual_price_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  country_of_manufacture ,
concat('"', coalesce(additional_attributes,''), '"') as  additional_attributes ,
concat('"', coalesce(isMatricula,''), '"') as  is_matricula ,
concat('"', coalesce(runflat_text,''), '"') as  runflat ,
concat('"', coalesce(Atributo09,''), '"') as  speed_index ,
concat('"', coalesce(Atributo06,''), '"') as  diameter ,
concat('"', coalesce(Atributo08,''), '"') as  height ,
concat('"', coalesce(Atributo07,''), '"') as  width ,
concat('"', coalesce(ActivoExterno,''), '"') as  activoexterno ,
concat('"', coalesce(EAN,''), '"') as  ean ,
concat('"', coalesce(Atributo16,''), '"') as  homologation ,
concat('"', coalesce(lpad(Atributo10,3,'0'),''), '"') as  load_index ,
concat('"', coalesce(Atributo03,''), '"') as  manufacturer ,
concat('"', coalesce(Matricula,''), '"') as  matricula ,
concat('"', coalesce(Atributo05,''), '"') as  season ,
concat('"', coalesce(Atributo04,''), '"') as  tyre_model ,
concat('"', coalesce(GrupoProducto,''), '"') as  vehicle_type  ,
concat('"', coalesce(disponibilidad,''), '"') as  availability ,
concat('"', coalesce(orden_disponibilidad,''), '"') as  availability_order ,
concat('"', coalesce(disponibilidad_matricula,''), '"') as  availability_matricula ,
concat('"', coalesce(orden_disponibilidad_matricula,''), '"') as  availability_order_matricula ,
concat('"', coalesce(availability_date,''), '"') as  availability_date ,
concat('"', coalesce(orden_alfabetico,''), '"') as  alphabetical_order ,
concat('"', coalesce(ecotasa_attribute,''), '"') as  ecotasa ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  out_of_stock_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  use_config_min_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  is_qty_decimal ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  allow_backorders ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  use_config_backorders ,
concat('"', coalesce('1',''), '"') as  min_cart_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  use_config_min_sale_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('5',''), '"') as  max_cart_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  use_config_max_sale_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  is_in_stock ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  notify_on_stock_below ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  use_config_notify_stock_qty ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  manage_stock ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  use_config_manage_stock ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  use_config_qty_increments ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  qty_increments ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  use_config_enable_qty_inc ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  enable_qty_increments ,
concat('"', coalesce('0',''), '"') as  is_decimal_divided ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  website_id ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  related_skus ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  related_position ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  crosssell_skus ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  crosssell_position ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  upsell_skus ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  upsell_position ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  additional_images ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  additional_image_labels ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  hide_from_product_page ,
concat('"', coalesce(custom_options,''), '"') as  custom_options ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_price_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_sku_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_price_view ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_weight_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_values ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  bundle_shipment_type ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  configurable_variations ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  configurable_variation_labels ,
concat('"', coalesce('',''), '"') as  associated_skus ,
originalfile
from AttributesAndOptions

select concat_ws
(',',
sku ,
store_view_code ,
attribute_set_code,
product_type ,
categories ,
product_websites ,
name ,
description ,
short_description ,
weight ,
product_online ,
tax_class_name ,
visibility ,
price ,
special_price ,
special_price_from_date ,
special_price_to_date ,
url_key ,
meta_title ,
meta_keywords ,
meta_description ,
base_image ,
base_image_label ,
small_image ,
small_image_label ,
thumbnail_image ,
thumbnail_image_label ,
swatch_image ,
swatch_image_label ,
created_at ,
updated_at ,
new_from_date ,
new_to_date ,
display_product_options_in ,
map_price ,
msrp_price ,
map_enabled ,
gift_message_available ,
custom_design ,
custom_design_from ,
custom_design_to ,
custom_layout_update ,
page_layout ,
product_options_container ,
msrp_display_actual_price_type ,
country_of_manufacture ,
additional_attributes ,
is_matricula ,
runflat ,
speed_index ,
diameter ,
height ,
width ,
activoexterno , ean, homologation, load_index,manufacturer,matricula,season,tyre_model,
vehicle_type, availability,availability_order,availability_matricula,
availability_order_matricula,availability_date, alphabetical_order,ecotasa,
qty ,
out_of_stock_qty ,
use_config_min_qty ,
is_qty_decimal ,
allow_backorders ,
use_config_backorders ,
min_cart_qty ,
use_config_min_sale_qty ,
max_cart_qty ,
use_config_max_sale_qty ,
is_in_stock ,
notify_on_stock_below ,
use_config_notify_stock_qty ,
manage_stock ,
use_config_manage_stock ,
use_config_qty_increments ,
qty_increments ,
use_config_enable_qty_inc ,
enable_qty_increments ,
is_decimal_divided ,
website_id ,
related_skus ,
related_position ,
crosssell_skus ,
crosssell_position ,
upsell_skus ,
upsell_position ,
additional_images ,
additional_image_labels ,
hide_from_product_page ,
custom_options ,
bundle_price_type ,
bundle_sku_type ,
bundle_price_view ,
bundle_weight_type ,
bundle_values ,
bundle_shipment_type ,
configurable_variations ,
configurable_variation_labels ,
associated_skus 
 ) as csv, originalfile
 from 
 ProductsFields

select *,Precio as pvp, Precio as pvp_promocionado,
 case 
 when Upper(Trim(Atributo03)) in ('MOTORTOWN','AURGI') then 1
 when Upper(Trim(Atributo03)) = '1PRECIO' then 3
 else 2 
 end as orden_alfabetico
  from Products_OK 
   where Categoria='NEUMATICOS'

select *,
case
when Atributo05 = 'I' then
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ', 'Invierno')
when Atributo05 = 'T' then
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ', '4 Estaciones')
else
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ')
end as titulo_temp,
case
when Atributo05 = 'I' then
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ', Atributo04,' ', Atributo16, 'Invierno')
when Atributo05 = 'T' then
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ', Atributo04,' ', Atributo16, '4 Estaciones')
else
concat('NEUMATICO ', Atributo03,' ', Atributo07, '/', Atributo08, ' R', Atributo06, ' ', Atributo10, 'V ', Atributo04,' ', Atributo16)
end as codigo_temp
 from ProductosOrden

select *,
case
when Atributo15 = 'R' then
concat(titulo_temp, ' ', Atributo15)
else
titulo_temp
end as titulo_neumatico_matricula,
case
when Atributo15 = 'R' then
concat(codigo_temp, ' ', Atributo15)
else
codigo_temp
end as codigo_neumatico_matricula,
case
when Atributo15='R' then 'yes'
else 'no'
end as runflat_text
from ProductosTemporalidad

select EAN,explode(split(ServiciosObligatorios,",")) as product_services
 from ProductosIngestados 
 where Categoria='NEUMATICOS'

select CodInterno,DescripcionAlias,Precio,coalesce(Atributo05,'0') as Atributo05,
 case when instr(DescripcionAlias,'PERMUTACION') > 0 then 
 	'name=Servicios Obligatorios,type=multiple,required=1,price=8.0000,price_type=fixed,sku=montaje,file_extension=,image_size_x=0,image_size_y=0,option_title=Montaje,time=10,calculation_per_unit=2'
 when instr(DescripcionAlias,'PARALE') > 0 then 
 	'name=Servicios Obligatorios,type=multiple,required=1,price=8.0000,price_type=fixed,sku=montaje,file_extension=,image_size_x=0,image_size_y=0,option_title=Montaje,time=10,calculation_per_unit=1'
 else 
 	'name=Servicios Obligatorios,type=multiple,required=1,price=8.0000,price_type=fixed,sku=montaje,file_extension=,image_size_x=0,image_size_y=0,option_title=Montaje,time=10,calculation_per_unit=0'
 end as cadena
 from DistinctServices
 where Categoria='SERVICIOS'

select CodInterno,DescripcionAlias,Precio, Atributo05,
regexp_replace(
	cadena,'montaje',CodInterno) as cadena2
from Services

select CodInterno,DescripcionAlias,Precio,Atributo05, 
regexp_replace(
	cadena2,'Montaje',DescripcionAlias) as cadena3
from ServicesSKU

select CodInterno,DescripcionAlias,Precio, Atributo05,
regexp_replace(
	cadena3,'8.0000',cast(format_number(cast(regexp_replace(Precio,',','.') as double),2) as String)) as cadena4
from ServicesDescription

select  a.EAN, b.custom_options,b.DescripcionAlias,b.Precio from ProductServices a
join ServicesTime b
 on a.product_services=b.CodInterno

select EAN, concat_ws("|",collect_list(custom_options)) as custom_options  
from UnionServices 
  group by EAN

select 
a.CodInterno, a.EAN, a.Matricula, a.DescripcionAlias, a.Descripcion02, a.Categoria
	,a.Atributo03,a.Atributo04,a.Atributo05
	,a.linkImgL,a.linkImgM,a.linkImgS
	,a.ServiciosObligatorios,a.ServiciosOpcionales
	,a.ActivoExterno,a.Precio
	,a.orden_alfabetico,a.titulo_neumatico_matricula,a.codigo_neumatico_matricula
	,a.product_online,a.originalfile
	,a.isMatricula,a.runflat_text,a.Atributo09
	,a.Atributo06,a.Atributo08,a.Atributo07,a.Atributo16,a.Atributo10
	,a.GrupoProducto,a.disponibilidad,a.orden_disponibilidad,a.disponibilidad_matricula
	,a.orden_disponibilidad_matricula,a.availability_date,b.ecotasa_attribute as ecotasa_attribute
 , additional_attributes , b.custom_options
 from Attributes a 
 join OptionsJoinsEcotasa b 
  on a.EAN=b.EAN

select CodInterno,DescripcionAlias,Precio,coalesce(Atributo05,'0') as Atributo05,
 case when instr(DescripcionAlias,'PERMUTACION') > 0 then 
 	'name=Servicios Opcionales,type=multiple,required=0,price=8.0000,price_type=fixed,sku=montaje,file_extension=,image_size_x=0,image_size_y=0,option_title=Montaje,time=10,calculation_per_unit=2'
 when instr(DescripcionAlias,'PARALE') > 0 then 
 	'name=Servicios Opcionales,type=multiple,required=0,price=8.0000,price_type=fixed,sku=montaje,file_extension=,image_size_x=0,image_size_y=0,option_title=Montaje,time=10,calculation_per_unit=1'
 else 
 	'name=Servicios Opcionales,type=multiple,required=0,price=8.0000,price_type=fixed,sku=montaje,file_extension=,image_size_x=0,image_size_y=0,option_title=Montaje,time=10,calculation_per_unit=0'
 end as cadena
 from DistinctServices
 where Categoria='SERVICIOS'

select CodInterno,DescripcionAlias,Precio,Atributo05,
regexp_replace(
	cadena,'montaje',CodInterno) as cadena2
from ServicesOpc

select CodInterno,DescripcionAlias,Precio,Atributo05, 
regexp_replace(
	cadena2,'Montaje',DescripcionAlias) as cadena3
from ServicesOpcSKU

select CodInterno,DescripcionAlias,Precio,Atributo05, 
regexp_replace(
	cadena3,'8.0000',cast(format_number(cast(regexp_replace(Precio,',','.') as double),2) as String)) as cadena4
from ServicesOpcDescription

select EAN,explode(split(ServiciosOpcionales,",")) as product_services
 from ProductosIngestados 
 where Categoria='NEUMATICOS'

select  a.EAN, b.custom_options,b.DescripcionAlias,b.Precio from ProductServicesOpc a
join ServicesOpcTime b
 on a.product_services=b.CodInterno

configuration.query:
create table if not exists MOTORTOWN.AURGICSVROWS
USING com.stratio.crossdata.connector.postgresql  OPTIONS (
   url '{{{POSTGRES_URL}}}',
   stratiosecurity 'true',
   stratiosecuritymode 'tls',
   driver 'org.postgresql.Driver',
   dbtable '(select * from {{{MOTORTOWN_SCHEMA}}}.aurgicsvrows where entity=\'motortown_productos_y_servicios.csv\') tmp'
)

configuration.sql: select * from Csv

configuration.query:
create table if not exists MOTORTOWN.AURGICVSSTOCKROWS
USING com.stratio.crossdata.connector.postgresql  OPTIONS (
   url '{{{POSTGRES_URL}}}',
   stratiosecurity 'true',
   stratiosecuritymode 'tls',
   driver 'org.postgresql.Driver',
   dbtable '(select * from {{{MOTORTOWN_SCHEMA}}}.aurgicsvrows where entity != \'motortown_productos_y_servicios.csv\') tmp'
)

configuration.sql:
select 
	Producto as CodInterno,
	Centro as id_navision,
	cast(Stock as bigint) as stock 
from CsvStock
union all 
select
	CodInterno,
	id_navision,
	cast(stock  as bigint) as stock
from PricatJoinProductos

select CodInterno, '2 horas' as disponibilidad, 1 as orden_disponibilidad
from
 (
select CodInterno,count(id_navision) as cuenta from stock 
 where cast(stock as int) >= 2
group by CodInterno
 ) tmp 
 where tmp.cuenta > 
 (select (count(*) * 70 / 100)  from 
	(
	select count(id_navision) from stock 
	  where id_navision not in ('20','100001')
	 group by id_navision
	) tmp
  )

select CodInterno, '48 horas' as disponibilidad,2 as orden_disponibilidad
from
 (
select CodInterno,count(id_navision) as cuenta from stock 
 where cast(stock as int) >= 2
group by CodInterno
 ) tmp 
 where tmp.cuenta < 
 (select (count(*) * 70 / 100)  from 
	(
	select count(id_navision) from stock 
	  where id_navision not in ('20','100001')
	 group by id_navision
	) tmp
  )
 and CodInterno in 
 (select CodInterno from stock where id_navision='20' and stock > 25)

select CodInterno, cast(date_add(current_date(),2) as string) as disponibilidad,3 as orden_disponibilidad
from
 (
select CodInterno,count(id_navision) as cuenta from stock 
 where cast(stock as int) >= 2
group by CodInterno
 ) tmp 
 where tmp.cuenta < 
 (select (count(*) * 70 / 100)  from 
	(
	select count(id_navision) from stock 
	 where id_navision not in ('20','100001')
	 group by id_navision
	) tmp
  )
 and CodInterno in 
 (select CodInterno from stock where id_navision='20' and cast(stock as int) <= 25)
 and CodInterno in 
 (select CodInterno from stock where id_navision='100001' and cast(stock as int) > 6)

select CodInterno, 'Disponible en algunos centros' as disponibilidad,4 as orden_disponibilidad
from
 (
select CodInterno,count(id_navision) as cuenta from stock 
 where cast(stock as int) >= 2
group by CodInterno
 ) tmp 
 where tmp.cuenta < 
 (select (count(*) * 70 / 100)  from 
	(
	select count(id_navision) from stock
	 where id_navision not in ('20','100001')
	 group by id_navision
	) tmp
  )
 and CodInterno in 
 (select CodInterno from stock where id_navision='20' and cast(stock as int) <= 25)
 and CodInterno in 
 (select CodInterno from stock where id_navision='100001' and cast(stock as int) <= 6)
and CodInterno in 
 (
 select CodInterno from
 	(
 	select CodInterno,count(id_navision) as cuenta from stock 
 	where cast(stock as int) >= 2
	group by CodInterno
 	) tmp 
 where tmp.cuenta > 3
   )

select substr(content, 0, length(content)-1)  as content,originalfile from MOTORTOWN.AURGICSVROWS
 where processts = 
 	(select max (processts) from MOTORTOWN.AURGICSVROWS)

select content from MOTORTOWN.AURGICVSSTOCKROWS
 where entity in ('motortown_stock_en_plataforma.csv','motortown_stock_por_centro.csv')
	 and content != 'Producto;Centro;Stock'

select a.*,coalesce(b.disponibilidad,'__EMPTY__VALUE__') as disponibilidad,coalesce(b.orden_disponibilidad,5) as orden_disponibilidad,
coalesce(b.availability_date,'__EMPTY__VALUE__') as availability_date from UnionIsMatricula a
left join 
	(select distinct * from AvailabilityDate) b
on a.CodInterno=b.CodInterno

select distinct csv,originalfile, current_timestamp as processts
 from MagentoCsvProducts

select CodInterno,DescripcionAlias,Precio, 
regexp_replace(
	cadena4,'time=10',concat('time=',Atributo05)) as custom_options
from ServicesPrice

select CodInterno,DescripcionAlias,Precio, 
regexp_replace(
	cadena4,'time=10',concat('time=',Atributo05)) as custom_options
from ServicesOpcPrice

select 
	CodInterno ,EAN , Matricula , DescripcionAlias , Descripcion02 , Bondades ,
	Estado ,Categoria ,GrupoProducto ,ActivoExterno ,Atributo01 ,Atributo02 ,
	Atributo04 ,Atributo05 ,Atributo06 ,Atributo07 ,Atributo08 ,Atributo09 ,
	Atributo11 ,Atributo12 ,Atributo13 ,Atributo14 ,Atributo15 ,Atributo16 ,
	regexp_replace(format_number(cast(regexp_replace(Precio,',','.') as double),2),',','') as Precio ,
	ServiciosObligatorios ,
	ServiciosOpcionales,DeshabilitadoVenta,ActualizarImagen,ActualizarProductos,FamiliaAntigua,
	case when ActualizarImagen='True' then linkImgL
		else '' end as linkImgL,
	case when ActualizarImagen='True' then linkImgM
		else '' end as linkImgM,
	case when ActualizarImagen='True' then linkImgS
		else '' end as linkImgS,
	case when Atributo03 in ('CONTINENTAL','PIRELLI','GOOD YEAR','GOOD YEAR','DUNLOP','FIRESTONE'
		,'BRIDGESTONE','MICHELIN','COOPER','HANKOOK','KUMHO','VREDESTEIN','YOKOHAMA','FALKEN'
		,'BF GOODRICH','MOTORTOWN','1PRECIO') then Atributo03
		else '1Precio' end as Atributo03,
	split(Atributo10,'/')[0] as Atributo10,
	originalfile
	from ProductosIngestados 
   where Categoria='NEUMATICOS'
    and GrupoProducto in ('TURISMO','TRAN LIGER','4X4')
	and Estado in ('ActivoSalida','Activo','Desactivado')
	and Atributo05 in ('0','I','T')
	and Atributo06 between 10 and 24
	and Atributo07 between 105 and 375 and substr(Atributo07,-1,1)='5'
	and Atributo08 between 20 and 95 and Atributo08 % 5 = 0
	and Atributo09 in 
	('A1', 'A2', 'A3', 'A4', 'A5', 'A6', 'A7', 'A8', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F' 
	 ,'G','J','K','L','M','N','P','Q','R','S','T','H','V','W','Y')
	and split(Atributo10,'/')[0] between 60 and 125
	and Atributo11 in ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F')
	and Atributo12 in ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E')
	and Atributo13 between 60 and 80
	and Atributo14 in ('1', '2', '3', '', 'ND', 'NA')
	and Atributo15 in ('R', '0')
	and Precio is not null

select 
	a.CodInterno, a.Categoria,a.GrupoProducto,a.Estado, 
	a.Atributo05,a.Atributo06,a.Atributo07,a.Atributo08, a.Atributo09,a.Atributo10,
	a.Atributo11,a.Atributo12,a.Atributo13,a.Atributo14,a.Atributo15, current_timestamp as processts
from ProductosIngestados a
 left join Products_OK b
 on b.CodInterno=a.CodInterno
 where b.CodInterno is null

select  EAN, 
cast(format_number(cast(regexp_replace(Precio,',','.') as double),2) as String) as ecotasa_attribute
from UnionServices
 where custom_options like '%ECOTASA%'

select  a.EAN,a.custom_options,b.ecotasa_attribute from CustomOptions a
join getEcotasa b
 on a.EAN=b.EAN

Select 
distinct 
concat('"', coalesce(id_navision,''), '"') as  source_code ,
concat('"', coalesce(CodInterno,''), '"') as  sku,
concat('"', coalesce(status,''), '"') as  status ,
concat('"', coalesce(availability,''), '"') as  availability ,
concat('"', coalesce(availability_order,''), '"') as  availability_order ,
concat('"', coalesce(availability_date,''), '"') as  availability_date 
from StockAvailabilityDate
 where id_navision not in ('20','100001')

select concat_ws
(',',
source_code ,
sku ,
status ,
availability ,
availability_order ,
availability_date 
 ) as csv, current_timestamp() as processts
 from 
 StockFields

select content from MOTORTOWN.AURGICVSSTOCKROWS
 where processts = 
 	(select max (processts) from MOTORTOWN.AURGICVSSTOCKROWS)
	and entity in ('pricat_ctop5.csv')

select split(content,';')[2] as EAN,
       split(content,';')[71] as STOCK 
from FixCsvPricat 
where substr(content,1,3) = 'POS'

select a.CodInterno as CodInterno,'100001' as id_navision, b.STOCK as stock
 from CsvPricat b
 join ProductosOrden a
 	on a.EAN=b.EAN

select * , 'Sí' as isMatricula
 from ProductosCalc
 where ActivoExterno='True' and Matricula in 
	 (
	 	select Matricula from 
		(
			select Matricula, ActivoExterno from ProductosCalc
			 where ActivoExterno = 'True'
		) tmp
		group by Matricula
		having count(0) = 1
	 )

select * , 'No' as isMatricula
 from ProductosCalc
 where CodInterno not in 
 ( select CodInterno from ProductosIsMatricula )

select a.CodInterno as CodInterno, '__EMPTY__VALUE__' as disponibilidad, 5 as orden_disponibilidad
from stock a
left join UnionDisponibilidad b
on a.CodInterno=b.CodInterno
where b.CodInterno is null

select a.*,b.orden_disponibilidad_matricula as orden_disponibilidad_matricula,
case when b.orden_disponibilidad_matricula=1 then '2 horas'
	 when b.orden_disponibilidad_matricula=2 then '48 horas'
	 when b.orden_disponibilidad_matricula=3 then 'Disponible a partir de fecha determinada'
	 when b.orden_disponibilidad_matricula=4 then 'Disponible en algunos centros'
else '__EMPTY__VALUE__' end as disponibilidad_matricula
from ProductosJoinStock a 
left join
(
select Matricula, min(orden_disponibilidad) as orden_disponibilidad_matricula from ProductosJoinStock
group by Matricula
) b
on a.Matricula = b.Matricula

select 
CodInterno,
id_navision,
1 as status,
case when stock >= 2 then '2 horas'
	when stock < 2 and stock_plataforma > 25 then '48 horas'
	else 'Disponible a partir de fecha determinada'
end as availability,
case when stock >= 2 then '1'
	when stock < 2 and stock_plataforma > 25 then '2'
	else '3'
end as availability_order
from stock_join_plataforma

select distinct a.CodInterno as CodInterno,a.id_navision as id_navision,a.stock as stock,coalesce(b.stock_plataforma,0) as stock_plataforma from
(
	select 
	Producto as CodInterno,
	Centro as id_navision,
	cast(Stock as bigint) as stock 
	from CsvStock
) a
left join
(
	 select 
	Producto as CodInterno,
    Centro as id_navision,
	max(cast(Stock as bigint)) as stock_plataforma
	from CsvStock
  	where Centro in ('20')
  	group by Producto,Centro
	
) b
on a.CodInterno=b.CodInterno

select a.CodInterno,a.id_navision,a.status, a.availability,a.availability_order,
case 
	when a.availability_order = '1' then cast(current_date() as string)
	when a.availability_order = '2' then cast(date_add(current_date(),2 + b.nfestivos) as string)
	when a.availability_order = '3' then cast(date_add(current_date(),2 + b.nfestivos) as string)
	else '__EMPTY__VALUE__'
 end as availability_date
from StockAvailability a
cross join 
(select count(0)as nfestivos from MOTORTOWN.FESTIVOS 
 where to_date(fecha) between current_date() and date_add(current_date(),2)) b

nodes.name: CrossdataFestivos
nodes.description:
create table if not exists MOTORTOWN.AURGICVSSTOCKROWS
USING com.stratio.crossdata.connector.postgresql  OPTIONS (
   url 'jdbc:postgresql://poolpostgrestls.marathon.mesos:5432/postgres?prepareThreshold=0',
   stratiosecurity 'true',
   stratiosecuritymode 'tls',
   driver 'org.postgresql.Driver',
   dbtable '(select * from motortown.aurgicsvrows where entity != \'motortown_productos_y_servicios.csv\') tmp'
)

configuration.query:
create table if not exists MOTORTOWN.FESTIVOS
USING com.stratio.crossdata.connector.postgresql  OPTIONS (
   url '{{{POSTGRES_URL}}}',
   stratiosecurity 'true',
   stratiosecuritymode 'tls',
   driver 'org.postgresql.Driver',
   dbtable '{{{MOTORTOWN_SCHEMA}}}.festivos_nacionales'
)

configuration.sql:
select a.CodInterno as CodInterno,
	a.orden_disponibilidad as orden_disponibilidad,
case 
	when a.orden_disponibilidad = '3' then cast(date_add(current_date(),2 + b.nfestivos) as string)
	else a.disponibilidad
 end as disponibilidad,	
case 
	when a.orden_disponibilidad = '1' then cast(current_date() as string)
	when a.orden_disponibilidad = '2' then cast(date_add(current_date(),2 + b.nfestivos) as string)
	when a.orden_disponibilidad = '3' then cast(date_add(current_date(),2 + b.nfestivos) as string)
	else '__EMPTY__VALUE__'
 end as availability_date
from UnionStock a
cross join 
(select count(0)as nfestivos from MOTORTOWN.FESTIVOS 
 where to_date(fecha) between current_date() and date_add(current_date(),2)) b

select CodInterno,id_navision,max(stock) as stock 
 from stock_with_duplicates
 group by CodInterno,id_navision

select CodInterno,id_navision,stock as stock 
 from stock_with_duplicates
 where stock is null
